title: More Myanmar quake survivors pulled from rubble as hundreds still missing
snippets: In Myanmar, a crisis has resulted in the death of at least 1,700 people. International aid has been provided by various countries, but rescue operations are facing significant challenges due to a shortage of necessary equipment.
summary: In Myanmar, a crisis has led to the death of at least 1,700 individuals. Despite international aid from different countries, rescue efforts are struggling due to a lack of essential equipment.

title: Trump 'very angry' with Putin over ceasefire negotiations
snippets: For the first time, Trump has issued a serious threat to Russia over delays in Ukraine ceasefire talks, signaling potential consequences.
summary: Former President Trump has for the first time issued a significant threat towards Russia regarding delays in ceasefire talks with Ukraine, indicating there could be potential consequences.

title: Red Cross outraged over killing of eight medics in Gaza
snippets: Last Sunday, an ambulance team was attacked during what Hamas claims was an operation by the Israeli military.
summary: An ambulance crew was assaulted last Sunday amid what Hamas alleges was a military operation conducted by Israel.

title: Decision day in court for Marine Le Pen's French presidential hopes
snippets: A court will decide on Monday if the leader of the far-right National Rally, accused of misusing European Union funds, is eligible to run for office again.
summary: A court is set to rule on Monday regarding the eligibility of the National Rally's leader, who faces accusations of misusing EU funds, to run for office.

title: New tariffs this week will hit all countries, Trump says
snippets: The US President is scheduled to announce a significant series of import taxes on Wednesday, according to statements made.
summary: The US President is set to announce a major series of import taxes on Wednesday, as confirmed by official statements.

title: Alex Ovechkin goals tracker: Capitals star five away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's all-time record
snippets: At his current scoring rate for the season, Ovechkin is projected to surpass Wayne Gretzky's record in the final game of the season.
summary: Alex Ovechkin is on track to break Wayne Gretzky's scoring record in the last game of the season based on his current scoring pace.

title: Men's Final Four predictions, previews for Auburn-Florida, Duke-Houston
snippets: The 1-seed teams reached San Antonio by demonstrating strong performance, with each team's key to advancing to the final being highlighted. There is a disagreement on the outcome of one of the games.
summary: The 1-seed teams advanced to San Antonio after showing strong performances. Their progression to the final was attributed to key plays and strategies. However, there is a disagreement regarding the outcome of one of the games.

title: 7 ejected after skirmish between Pistons, Wolves
snippets: During a basketball game on Sunday, a fight erupted in the second quarter, leading to the ejection of five players and two coaches. This incident occurred during the Timberwolves' 123-104 victory over the Pistons.
summary: During a basketball game on Sunday, a fight broke out in the second quarter, resulting in the ejection of five players and two coaches. The altercation happened during the Timberwolves' 123-104 win against the Pistons.

title: Source: Tush push ban has support in committee
snippets: At the NFL league meetings in West Palm Beach, Florida, a proposal by the Green Bay Packers to ban the "tush push" technique has gained support from the competition committee, according to a source familiar with the discussions, as reported by ESPN.
summary: At the NFL league meetings in West Palm Beach, Florida, the Green Bay Packers' proposal to ban the "tush push" technique has received backing from the competition committee, as per a source cited by ESPN.

title: Durant exits, helped off court during Suns' loss
snippets: Phoenix Suns forward Kevin Durant was assisted to the locker room, unable to put weight on his left leg, after a collision with Houston Rockets' Jabari Smith Jr. during the third quarter of Sunday's game.
summary: Phoenix Suns forward Kevin Durant was helped to the locker room after a collision with Houston Rockets' Jabari Smith Jr. left him unable to put weight on his left leg during the third quarter of Sunday's game.

title: Trump threatens secondary tariffs on Russian oil if no deal on Ukraine
snippets: The US President expressed frustration with Vladimir Putin for delaying progress in ceasefire negotiations.
summary: The US President has expressed frustration over Vladimir Putin's role in slowing down ceasefire negotiations.

title: Asia stock markets tumble as Trump’s tariffs loom
snippets: Japanese and South Korean stock markets experienced declines due to worries about how their exports might be affected.
summary: Stock markets in Japan and South Korea fell amid concerns over potential impacts on their exports.

title: Trump revokes permits for oil companies in Venezuela to pressure Maduro
snippets: Authorities in a Latin American country have taken action against Eni and Global Oil Terminals, following the earlier cancellation of Chevron's license to operate there.
summary: Authorities in a Latin American country have acted against energy companies Eni and Global Oil Terminals, following the earlier revocation of Chevron's operating license in the same region.

title: It’s time for the EU to solve its Orbán problem
snippets: The European Commission is encouraged to utilize its influence against the Hungarian Prime Minister, who is seen as obstructive, to address the situation.
summary: The European Commission is being urged to use its power to address issues caused by the Hungarian Prime Minister, who is viewed as being obstructive.

title: The use and abuse of investment bank bonuses
snippets: HSBC has dismissed several bankers without offering them a payout, indicating a broader shift in the company's approach to incentives and compensation practices.
summary: HSBC has terminated a number of its bankers, choosing not to provide them with any form of compensation. This action reflects a change in the company's strategy regarding employee incentives and pay structures.
